ygData.subject: Re: CE: Slime
ygData.msgSnippet: My personal pet peeve against slime is killing it only to have to grow back to its original size. I also swear heartburst attacks are useless against slime

My personal pet peeve against slime is killing it only to have to grow 
back to its original size.

I also swear heartburst attacks are useless against slime because 
everytime I use it on them, they grow to a large size if they aren't 
already a large one.

(More comments pending discussion)
